title: GRID slashes prices on iconic tech frames for Black Friday 2024
description: Following pre-Black Friday sales, GRID – the company known for transforming gadgets into wall art – has unveiled its Black Friday 2024 deals. This year’s Black Friday deals feature significant discounts on some of GRID’s most popular frames, giving tech enthusiasts and nostalgia lovers the perfect opportunity to add a touch of tech history to your home or office decor. Our friends over at 9to5Toys have all the latest details on the best Black Friday deals. more…
author: Filipe Espósito
excerpt: Following pre-Black Friday sales, GRID – the company known for transforming gadgets into wall art – has unveiled its Black...
text: Following pre-Black Friday sales, GRID – the company known for transforming gadgets into wall art – has unveiled its Black Friday 2024 deals. This year’s Black Friday deals feature significant discounts on some of GRID’s most popular frames, giving tech enthusiasts and nostalgia lovers the perfect opportunity to add a touch of tech history to your home or office decor. Our friends over at 9to5Toys have all the latest details on the best Black Friday deals. GRID Black Friday 2024 GRID’s Black Friday 2024 sale includes massive discounts on several iconic pieces: iPhone 2G: $299 iPhone 4s: $99 1st gen Apple Watch: $149 Game Boy Pocket: $129 Game Boy: $179 Additionally, GRID is offering a 20% discount on all collections when you use the coupon code “BF20” at checkout. About GRID frames GRID specializes in repurposing devices such as Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad, and MacBook, transforming them into nostalgic art pieces through careful disassembly. Each frame showcases the intricate internal components of these devices, creating a unique blend of technology and art. The frames boast a sleek, contemporary design suitable for any home or office setting. Whether you’re a tech enthusiast, a collector, or simply someone who appreciates the evolution of gadgets, GRID frames offer a distinctive way to show your passion. My first GRID product was the GRID 4S, which has become a notable decoration in my home. I also took a look back at the evolution of iPhone hardware using GRID frames, highlighting the progression from the iPhone 2G and iPhone 3GS to the iPhone 6 and iPhone 7, in addition to the GRID iPad mini. Limited Time Offer These Black Friday 2024 deals from GRID present an excellent opportunity to buy these unique pieces of tech art at reduced prices. Whether you’re shopping for yourself or looking for the perfect gift for a tech lover, now is the perfect time to buy a GRID frame. Visit GRID’s website to explore all the discounted frames and place your order before the sale ends. Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed.  FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
html:
Following pre-Black Friday sales, GRID – the company known for transforming gadgets into wall art – has unveiled its Black Friday 2024 deals. This year’s Black Friday deals feature significant discounts on some of GRID’s most popular frames, giving tech enthusiasts and nostalgia lovers the perfect opportunity to add a touch of tech history to your home or office decor.

Our friends over at 9to5Toys have all the latest details on the best Black Friday deals.

GRID Black Friday 2024

GRID’s Black Friday 2024 sale includes massive discounts on several iconic pieces:

  • iPhone 2G: $299
  • iPhone 4s: $99
  • 1st gen Apple Watch: $149
  • Game Boy Pocket: $129
  • Game Boy: $179

Additionally, GRID is offering a 20% discount on all collections when you use the coupon code “BF20” at checkout.

About GRID frames

GRID specializes in repurposing devices such as Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad, and MacBook, transforming them into nostalgic art pieces through careful disassembly. Each frame showcases the intricate internal components of these devices, creating a unique blend of technology and art.

The frames boast a sleek, contemporary design suitable for any home or office setting. Whether you’re a tech enthusiast, a collector, or simply someone who appreciates the evolution of gadgets, GRID frames offer a distinctive way to show your passion.

My first GRID product was the GRID 4S, which has become a notable decoration in my home. I also took a look back at the evolution of iPhone hardware using GRID frames, highlighting the progression from the iPhone 2G and iPhone 3GS to the iPhone 6 and iPhone 7, in addition to the GRID iPad mini.

Limited Time Offer

These Black Friday 2024 deals from GRID present an excellent opportunity to buy these unique pieces of tech art at reduced prices. Whether you’re shopping for yourself or looking for the perfect gift for a tech lover, now is the perfect time to buy a GRID frame.

Visit GRID’s website to explore all the discounted frames and place your order before the sale ends.

Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed. 

FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
